Overview and Learning Objectives

Welcome to Session 2: Deeper Learning in Workforce Preparation Activities Teaching.

In this session, you will explore approaches to teaching workforce preparation activities and employability skills, in ways that encourage deeper learning. You will also explore key practices of deeper learning, and identify relevant resources which can and have been used to develop effective Workforce Preparation Activities and employability skills lessons. This session will focus on additional resources, guidance on lesson planning, and instruction.

After completing this session, you will be able to:

  • 2-1:  List the six key practices of deeper learning.

  • 2-2:  Describe examples of deeper learning practices in the classroom.

  • 2-3:  Explain why using lessons contextualized explicitly to real-life settings are the best way to teach adult learners.

  • 2-4:  Describe strategies for creating contextualized lessons.

  • 2-5:  Name resources that may help you create contextualized lessons taught explicitly in the context of exploring various careers.

 

Continue to Deeper Learning Review.
